definitions: characterized by comprehension of the parts of something as intimately interconnected and explicable only by reference to the whole.
shortDefinitions: characterized by belief that parts of something are intimately interconnected and explicable only by reference to whole

definitions: characterized by the treatment of the whole person, taking into account mental and social factors, rather than just the symptoms of a disease.
shortDefinitions: characterized by treatment of whole person, taking into account mental and social factors
